name: Jai Vakeel Foundation & Research Centre

address: Opp. Abhyuday Nagar Bldg. No. 12 Near Kalachowki Police Station

briefDescription: The institute provides holistic services to individuals with ID under four broad categories – Healthcare, Education, Skill Development and Support services. Healthcare:•	Diagnostic and therapy centre•	Paediatric neurological medical camps in rural MaharashtraEducation:•	Jai Vakeel School Mumbai – 350 students•	Jai Vakeel School, Talegaon, Pune – 40 students•	Rusi Irani Centre, Devlali, Nashik – 40 students•	Autism Centre, Mumbai – 25 studentsSkill Development:•	Vocational Training Centre & Sheltered Workshop – 300 students•	Respite care – 83 individuals
